title: Star Wars Ahsoka Episodes 1 & 2 BREAKDOWN (FULL SPOILERS)
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Tim, Barrett, Saige Ryan, and Carboni give their reaction and review of Star Wars Ahsoka on Disney Plus starring Rosario Dawson. 

Follow Saige: https://twitter.com/NotSaige  

Follow Anthony: https://twitter.com/acarboni

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Gamescast Background Art by https://twitter.com/Orioto
